resources.string: No permission to delete this diary
No permission to modify this diary
No permission to access this diary
Start time cannot be later than end time
Your %s is out of stock. Please replenish to avoid affecting your medication schedule
Your %1$s has %2$d%3$s remaining, reaching the low stock threshold (%4$d%5$s). Please replenish soon
This medication already exists. Continue adding?
Total quantity must be non-negative integer
Remaining quantity must be non-negative and not exceed total
Dosage per dose must be positive integer
Low stock threshold must be non-negative integer
Insufficient storage, clear space and retry
System error, restart app and retry
Camera permission needed to take medication photos
Please manually grant camera permission in settings
Storage permission needed to save medication photos
Please manually grant storage permission in settings
Permission denied, cannot use this feature
Permission permanently denied, please grant manually in settings
Are you sure you want to cancel? Unsaved info will be lost.
Are you sure you want to delete this medication? This action cannot be undone.
Photo file too large, please select smaller photo
Name will be used to personalize medication reminders
Gender info helps provide more accurate health advice
Birth date used to calculate age and provide age-related health reminders

Email for important notifications and password recovery
Phone for emergency alerts and identity verification

Username can only contain letters, numbers and underscores

Birth date format incorrect, please use YYYY-MM-DD format
Birth date cannot be in the future
User age must be at least %d years
Username length must be between %1$d-%2$d characters
Username can only contain letters, numbers and underscores
Phone number format incorrect, please enter valid Chinese mobile number
Photo file format not supported, please use JPG, PNG or GIF format
